comments: Sibongile has excellent work ethic and collaborates well with the team.
Lungile has demonstrated strong leadership in handling complex HR issues and improving employee morale.
Thabo pays great attention to detail but sometimes delays test reporting.
Keshav has exceeded his sales targets for two consecutive quarters.
Zanele brings creative marketing strategies and strong execution.
Sipho designs clean and user-friendly interfaces.
Naledi ensures infrastructure is always up and running with high efficiency.
Farai is improving in content planning but needs to meet deadlines more consistently.
Karabo handles financial reporting accurately and meets tight deadlines.
Fatima leads the support team with professionalism and ensures high client satisfaction.
